casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Felix Ricardo SALDIERNA 271PA15-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2018 W. Rob Heroy, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Saldierna, Felix. Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 24th of January 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of January 2018."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 8th day of March 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
